name: Reaction Stickers
description:
Design reviews are great, but people lose focus fast.


We want to help.


Want to make sure folks are focusing on the right things? Use this sticker pack to:

  • Point at stuff
  • React to stuff
  • Make design reviews more colorful.


Toss these bad boys into a Figma file, and regain focus fast.


These stickers are made by your friends at Gravy. Got a cool sticker idea? email figma-stickers@heygravy.com.


❤️
